text:
Kit Number 6
ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
We wish to express our appreciation to the fol lowing for special
cooperation and assistance in the preparation of the film in this kit:
The National Aeronautics and Space Administration
Mr. James F. Macandrew, Director of Broadcasting, New York
City Board of Education.
Mr. Jerry Silverstein, WNYE-TV, New York, New York.
Mr. William Fagan, Director of Broadcast Services, Midwest
Program on Airborne Television Instruction, Inc., Lafayette,
Indiana.
Dr. M. Virginia Biggy, Director of Instructional Television,
Eastern Educational Network, Cambridge, Massachusetts.
Mr. Joel Samuels and Miss Cydney Burrell, National Film
Board of Canada, New York, New York.
Mr. Harvey R. Herbst, Manager, KLRN-TV, Southwest Texas
Educational Television Council, Austin, Texas.
Mr. Thomas Ditzel, Instructional Coordinator, KLRN-TV,
Southwest Texas Educational Television Council, Austin, Texas.
Mrs. Myrtle Bagwell Boyce, Assistant Instructional Coordinator,
KLRN-TV,and Research Assistant, Applications Research Branch,
Research and Development Center in Teacher Education, The
University of Texas.
Mr. David Prowitt, Executive Producer, NETScience Programs,
National Educational Television, New York.
Mr. Fred H. Matthys, Principal, Lanier High School, Austin,
Texas, for permission to use school facilities.
Mr. Charles L. Tennyson, civics teacher, Lanier High School,
Austin, Texas, for appearing in the film.
G-20
